identified-content.object.title: BABY (MUSICAL)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

block.p: LEAD: The musical ''Baby'' will be presented through Sunday at St. Bart's Playhouse, Park Avenue and 50th Street. The show, which ran on Broadway in 1983, has a book by Sybille Pearson, music by David Shire and lyrics by Richard Maltby Jr. Information: 751-1616.
